original_title: Huicholes: Los Últimos Guardianes del Peyote
overview: A story about the Wixárika People, one of the last living Pre-Hispanic cultures in Latin America, and their struggle to preserve Wirikuta, their most sacred territory and the land where the peyote grows, the traditional medicine that keeps alive the knowledge of this iconic people of Mexico
title: Huicholes: The Last Peyote Guardians
